results.content: 我会把这个棉花棒放进您的鼻子。你会感到不舒服，请忍一下。

phrase.content: I'm going to put this cotton bud into your nostrils. You will feel strange but it is not painful.

results.romanized: Wǒ huì bǎ zhè ge mián huā bàng fàng jìn nín de bí zi. Nǐ huì gǎn dào bú shū fú, qǐng rěn yī xià.

results.content: 这是用来检测冠状病毒。

phrase.content: This is to test for coronavirus

results.romanized: zhè shì yòng lái jiǎn cè guān zhuàng bìng dú 。

results.content: 如果您的冠状病毒检测报告为阳性, 我们明天会再打电话给你。

phrase.content: If coronavirus positive, we call your phone by tomorrow.

results.romanized: rú guǒ nín de guàn zhuàng bìng dú jiǎn cè bào gào wei yáng xìng, wǒ men míng tiān huì zài dǎ diàn huà gěi nín。

results.content: 如果冠状病毒检测报告为阴性，我们3天后会向你发送简讯。

phrase.content: If coronavirus negative, we send you an SMS after 3 days.

results.romanized: Rú guǒ guān zhuàng bìng dú jiǎn cè bào gào wei yīn xìng, wǒ men sān tiān hòu huì xiàng nǐ fā sòng jiǎn xùn。

results.content: 请把头往后仰 / 请抬头向上
results.romanized: qǐng bǎ tóu wǎng hòu yǎng / qǐng tái tóu xiàng shàng

phrase.content: Later, you will do an X-ray

results.romanized: dài hùi ér gěi nǐ zhào X guāng

results.content: 你的X光报告显示肺部没有发炎的迹象。

phrase.content: There is no sign of infection on your X-ray

results.romanized: nǐ de X guāng bào gào xiǎn shì fèi bù méi yǒu fā yán de jī xiàng 。
